config:get:region.description: Get current region set for CLI

cda.name: cda
cda.description: Custom host to set for content delivery API, if this flag is added then cma and name flags are required

cma.name: cma
cma.description: Custom host to set for content management API, , if this flag is added then cda and name flags are required

name.name: name
name.description: Name for the region, if this flag is added then cda and cma flags are required
